flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: Hello everyone, we are Sergio Ricardo Carpio and Carpio. We want to introduce our RV project for children, Aleix 6x6. This is a small 6-wheel stroller, all motor, based on an Arduino MEGA 2560. It uses a DC motor controllers 20A MD03. It provides for a Bl
guide.title: Children electric car controlled by Arduino-based Android
